text: Harry made a discreet entrance as he slipped from his car and into St Luke ’ s Church in Chelsea for the Henry Van Straubenzee Memorial Fund carol concert this evening. The event comes a few days after Harry and his fiancee's first official royal event in Nottingham after announcing their engagement. But while Meghan has now officially relocated to the UK and is living in the Nottingham Cottage in Kensington Palace with her royal beau, she was absent from tonight's service. Instead, Harry ’ s former girlfriend Cressida Bonas showed she had no hard feelings for her former flame as she arrived at the church tonight, CONSTANT MEDIA - PA Prince Harry and ex - Cressida attend carol concert without Meghan Cressida - the youngest daughter of 1960s “ It girl ” Lady Mary
